Threat Scenario: Prompt injection causes model to reveal system prompts or hidden context
Recommended Mitigation: Prompt hardening + never include secrets in prompts + output filtering

Threat Scenario: Unauthorized retrieval returns restricted documents (ACL bypass)
Recommended Mitigation: Enforce authZ at retrieval time + per-user filters + post-retrieval checks

Threat Scenario: Knowledge base poisoning introduces malicious instructions into retrieved context
Recommended Mitigation: Ingestion validation + source trust + moderation + approvals

Threat Scenario: Vector index/metadata tampering biases retrieval or leaks data
Recommended Mitigation: Strict RBAC + audit logs + versioning + integrity monitoring
Redaction + scrub tokens/secrets + retention limits + access controls

Threat Scenario: Token/compute exhaustion via long prompts or adversarial inputs
Recommended Mitigation: Input limits + truncation + quotas + timeouts + caching

Threat Scenario: Cross-tenant leakage through shared vector indexes or storage
Build pipeline compromise modifies system prompt/guardrails
Recommended Mitigation: Signed builds + protected branches + least-priv CI/CD + secret isolation

Threat Scenario: Spoofed session/user queries retrieval as another user
Recommended Mitigation: Strong auth + session binding + token validation + rate limits

Threat Scenario: Model output triggers privileged actions beyond user authorization (tool abuse)
Recommended Mitigation: Server-side policy enforcement for tools + allowlists + HITL for high risk
Notes: If tools not enabled mark N/A

Threat Scenario: LLM provider outage or rate limits degrade system
Insufficient auditability (no record of retrieved docs/prompt hashes)
Recommended Mitigation: Log prompt hash + retrieval IDs + doc versions + request IDs
